Texts.Eng:
The Mantid are a largely nomadic species with no homeworld of their own. What few traditions their kind have are devoted to the art of war, and most Mantid take great pride in personally eviscerating their enemies.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Carnivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  Health x^green;1.1^reset;, Damage x^green;1.2^reset;
  +^green;15^reset;% Move Speed, +^green;10^reset;% Jump Height
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^green;10^reset;% Physical, +^green;40^reset;% Radiation, +^green;20^reset;% Shadow
  ^cyan;Immune^reset;: Insanity

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  On ^green;hot or jungle^reset; biomes: Health x^green;1.1^reset;, +^green;10^reset;% Speed
  Improved ground traction

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Fist: Damage x^green;1.2^reset;, +^green;50^reset;% Knockback Resist
  Dual Fist: +^green;2.5^reset;% Crit Chance, +^green;5^reset; Defense
  Shotgun: Damage x^green;1.15^reset;, Energy x^green;1.25^reset;

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  Energy x^red;0.8^reset;, -^red;25^reset;% Charisma
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;50^reset;% Poison, -^red;20^reset;% Ice
